Boira Mteki (1946–September, 1991) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe.
Ọ bụ nwa afọ nke Harare, Mteki

O so na ndị guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ Frank McEwen's Workshop School, ọ sokwa na ndị mbụ n'ime ndị na-akpụ ya iji nkume obodo siri ike, dị ka serpentinite, granite, limestone, na springstone, nke dị mgbe ahụ
Ọrụ ya dị ugbu a na nchịkọta nke National Gallery of Zimbabwe na Chapungu Sculpture Park
